title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body:
Really ascension again already??? "rotating game mode" my arse there is at least another 5 game modes you haven't put out, lazy riot is lazy, 

where is:
doom bots, 
all for one, 
Black market brawlers,
 Nemesis,
 Dominion?

who really liked black market brawerls?
and they did have one for all
doom bots pls
doom bots? :c
Is Doom Bots going to be a thing or not? Because I really want to play it since I didn't get to play it when it was a thing
logged in just to upvote this. Would love to try DOOM BOTS myself as didn't have a chance last time it was out.
Nemesis?
_deleted_

I reckon there should be a game mode called
**Friendly Fire Setting**, or **FFS** for short.

_tl;dr_ you can attack your allies. AoE effects damage your allies and enemies.
what happen to doom bots?
^ yehp.. they havent done half of the game modes and they're already recycling ones they have already done,

they are doing Ascension and URF, cos they are the most liked and they are probebly putting them up in a ratio of demand, URF being most demanded and Ascension next, were black market brawler and doom bots dont seem to be in such high demand from their statistics. 


I could be completly wrong here so dont take my word for it. this is just my own view (may have bad spelling or grammar sorry)

BTW i want doom bots too
Omg, Urf is coming out on my birthday!
urf is coming out when i have exams ;-;

I call bs I have got so many S but I don't get any keys and the thing is you guys said the plays would have a better key drop rate there is not I play so many bad games and I still have got any keys the keys are not even dropped I have got one of over 4 weeks
DEFINITELY NOT DOMINION WOOOO
Is this the first time it's gone from 1pm-5am (NZT) every day - or did other game modes go all weekend?? I so can't remember!
Question, would it be possible to combine two gamemodes together... for e.g. OFA + URF?
Anyone gonna question what the "Definitely not Dominion" is all about? New game mode? Or just bringing back Dominion??
I'm glad they decided to not try out the other games modes, these ones are by far the best. While ones like Nemesis and Black Market Brawlers are just less fun versions of the original game
Is this gonna keep happening for the rest of the year? Because I like this rotating gamemode thing.
